alert.note: Alert for Randolph; Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 30 at 9:01AM CST until January 01 at 10:40AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Clay, Cleburne, Randolph and Talladega. * WHEN...Until noon CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 859 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. - Additional rainfall over the next few hours will keep small streams elevated with some minor flooding possible. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Talladega, Roanoke, Lineville, Ashland, Wedowee, Lake Wedowee, Ranburne, Waldo, Woodland, Barfield, Delta, Malone, Fosters Cross Roads, Corinth, Morrison Cross Roads, Crystal Lake, Cragford, Ofelia, R.L. Harris Dam and Mellow Valley.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
